name: Likelihood ratio test
description: Executes an ANOVA-like comparison between two or more groups of samples. This tests the significance of particular covariate, for instance if any of 3 treatments cause changes in gene expression. To do this, DESeq2 compares two models: one including the covariate of interest and one without.

raw_counts.description: The input raw count matrix. Must be an integer-based table.
raw_counts.name: Count matrix:

annotations.description: The sample annotations. This must include a column with your covariate of interest. This way, we know which samples are assigned to which groups. Other columns/covariates are ignored.
annotations.name: Annotations:

covariate.description: The name of the column to use for assigning groups. For example, if you have a column named "treatment", then type that.
covariate.name: Covariate:
